EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Creating a property website is quick and easy with our One-Click feature! Follow these steps to effortlessly create a dedicated website for your properties:
1. Log in to the Presenceâ„¢ Platform. 2. From your dashboard, navigate to Websites and click on Property Sites. 3. Click Create Property Site in the top-right corner. 4. Select the property you'd like to create a website for from your list of listings. 5. Customize your property website by choosing a design template, adding or editing details such as images, property descriptions, and more. 6. Once you've made your adjustments, click Publish to launch the site.
That's it! Your property website is now live and ready to showcase your listing.
This article from our Help Center walks through the steps in more detail: https://luxurypresence.my.site.com/helpcenter/s/article/How-to-Create-a-One-Click-Property-Website
Let us know if you have any questions - we're here to help!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} Luxury Presence Support (310) 955-1077 support@luxurypresence.com
